text: Below is a list of questions that relate to life experiences common among people who have been diagnosed with depression. Please read each question carefully, and indicate how often you have experienced the same or similar challenges in the past few months.
Little interest or pleasure in doing things

options.text: More than half of the days
More than half of the days

text: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

options.text: More than half of the days

text: Feeling tired or having little energy

options.text: More than half of the days
More than half of the days

text: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

options.text: More than half of the days

text: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

options.text: More than half of the days

text: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed

options.text: More than half of the days

text: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself

options.text: More than half of the days

text: If you've had any days with issues above, how difficult have these problems made it for you at work, home, school, or with other people?

options.text: More than half of the days
